title: High School Girl's Take on Hand Lettering
content:
Alright, so this is really more of me looking for recommendations than an actual ID, but I’m supposed to try to match the lettering you can see in the attached screen grab. So, I need a face that’s like a high school girl’s best attempt at calligraphy. A little amateurish and hopefully very hand drawn. Anybody have a suggestion?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [calligraphy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012102/http:/typophile.com/files/calligraphy.jpg) | 54.86 KB |

 [‹ Au Bauer Text Initials - where to find](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012102/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38014 "Go to previous forum topic") [help please- delicious ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012102/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38020 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content:
You mean like a gossip girl’s handwriting? I think Lorelei looks bubbly enough to have been written by a high schooler.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/lorelei/script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012102/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/lorelei/script/)

Thanks for all the tips so far, folkses!  
.s

—  
_Spencer Cross_
